name: Loco Motion: Trolley Turmoil
description:
Ever wanted to push the food trolley on a train? Well now you can!

Take orders, make hot beverages and deliver an excellent level of customer service, all while fighting to stay balanced on a bumpy train. Try no to spill any coffee while handing an old man his tuna mayo sandwich (unless he deserves it!).

Meet the Team:
  • Alex Craig Design
  • Kim Peters Writing
  • Lila Jones 2D Art
  • Louis Horne 3D Art
  • Oliver Britland 3D Art
  • Olly Jones Design
  • Sam Richards Programming
  • Tabbie Pearson 2D Art
How to Play:

Employee Training Guide:

Step 1. Approach the customer and kindly ask for their order, make sure to memorize it!

Step 2a. Once all orders have been taken, head to the prep room in the back of the carriage to prepare their food.

Step 2b. If the customer asks for any snacks (chocolate, sweets etc.) or bottled drinks, you can grab them directly off the trolley.

Step 3. Making hot beverages? Grab a cup and turn on the machine to dispense the drink into their cup. Preparing one of our delicious unbranded hot meals? Heat it up in the microwave and it's good to go!

Step 4. Once all food has been prepared, place them onto the trolley ready to be served.

Step 5. Deliver our tasty food with prime customer service, try to avoid any spills! Remember, a fed customer is a happy customer!

Controls:

WASD - Movement

E - Interact

LEFT Mouse button - Pick up item

RIGHT Mouse button - Drop item

Q, E, R & F - Rotate 

Made during the Mind the Gap Game Jam 2022 hosted by  Games Academy at Falmouth University.
